name: VR Yarn Barn Ugly Sweater Co.
name_original: VR Yarn Barn Ugly Sweater Co.
description:
This is a submission for the Seattle Indies Slow Jam 2021 whose them was 'cozy'.

It's getting colder and the only way to warm up is making ugly sweaters. You have full access to a yarn barn where you'll be able to dye, weave and string together a never ending supply of ugly sweaters!

This was a solo project by myself. The one and only el shrimpo.

A good majority of the models, music and sfx come from various assets I have purchased over the years. A big shoutout to texturecan.com for having amazing materials (especially yarn!).

I have posted two different builds. One is an apk file for Oculus Quest and the other is a PC build for any other VR headset device.
